changeSet.author: bsutton
changeSet.sql: update Tag set name = 'Joey Leaders' where name = 'Joey Leader'
update Tag set name = 'Cub Leaders' where name = 'Cub Leader'
update Tag set name = 'Scout Leaders' where name = 'Scout Leader'
update Tag set name = 'Venturer Leaders' where name = 'Venturer Leader'
update Tag set name = 'Rover Leaders' where name = 'Rover Leader'
update Tag set name = 'District Leaders' where name = 'District Leader'
update Tag set name = 'Region Leaders' where name = 'Region Leader'
update Tag set name = 'Branch Leaders' where name = 'Branch Leader'
update Tag set name = 'Assistant Leaders' where name = 'Assistant Leader'

column.name: description
column.value: Any contact that doesn't have a role within the Scout Group.

changeSet.sql: update Contact set GroupRole_ID = (select id from GroupRole where name = 'None')

column.name: name
column.value: Section Helpers

column.name: description
column.value: An adult that assists with delivering section programs but who is not a Leader.

changeSet.sql: update Tag set name = 'Section Helpers' where name = 'Adult Helper'
insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Section Helpers'), (select id from Tag where name='Section Helpers'))

column.name: name
column.value: Assistant Leaders

column.name: description
column.value: An qualified Leader that assists the Section Leader in delivering programs.

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Assistant Leaders'), (select id from Tag where name='Assistant Leaders'))
insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Assistant Leaders'), (select id from Tag where name='Council Member'))

column.name: name
column.value: Committee Member

column.name: description
column.value: A member of the Group's organising committee.

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Committee Member'), (select id from Tag where name='Committee Member'))

column.name: name
column.value: Council Member

column.name: description
column.value: A member of the Group's Council, normally a Section Leader.

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Council Member'), (select id from Tag where name='Council Member'))

column.name: description
column.value: A Legal Gardian of a Youth Member.

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Gardian'), (select id from Tag where name='Parent'))

column.name: name
column.value: Group Leader

column.name: description
column.value: The Scout Group's CEO

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Group Leader'), (select id from Tag where name='Group Leader'))
insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Group Leader'), (select id from Tag where name='Council Member'))
insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Group Leader'), (select id from Tag where name='Committee Member'))

column.name: description
column.value: A leader of a Section

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Leaders'), (select id from Tag where name='Leaders'))
insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Leaders'), (select id from Tag where name='Council Member'))

column.name: description
column.value: A Parent of a Youth Member or a Prospective Youth Member

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Parent'), (select id from Tag where name='Parent'))

column.name: description
column.value: The President of the Scout Group's organising Committee.

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='President'), (select id from Tag where name='President'))
insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='President'), (select id from Tag where name='Committee Member'))

column.name: description
column.value: The QuarterMaster responsible for equipment management.

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='QuarterMaster'), (select id from Tag where name='QuarterMaster'))
insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='QuarterMaster'), (select id from Tag where name='Committee Member'))

column.name: name
column.value: Recruitment Officer

column.name: description
column.value: The committee member responsible recruitment.

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Recruitment Officer'), (select id from Tag where name='Recruitment Officer'))
insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Recruitment Officer'), (select id from Tag where name='Committee Member'))

column.name: description
column.value: The Secretary of the Scout Group's organising Committee.

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Secretary'), (select id from Tag where name='Secretary'))
insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Secretary'), (select id from Tag where name='Committee Member'))

column.name: description
column.value: The Treasurer of the Scout Group's organising Committee.

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Treasurer'), (select id from Tag where name='Treasurer'))
insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Treasurer'), (select id from Tag where name='Committee Member'))

column.name: description
column.value: A person who Volunteers time within the Scout Group.

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Volunteer'), (select id from Tag where name='Volunteer'))

column.name: name
column.value: Youth Member

column.name: description
column.value: A youth who is an member of the Scout Group.

changeSet.sql: insert into GroupRole_Tag (GroupRole_ID, tags_ID) values ((select id from GroupRole where name='Youth Member'), (select id from Tag where name='Youth Member'))
update Contact set GroupRole_ID = (select id from GroupRole where name = 'Youth Member' ) where Role = 1
update Contact set GroupRole_ID = (select id from GroupRole where name = 'Parent' ) where Role = 2
update Contact set GroupRole_ID = (select id from GroupRole where name = 'Volunteer' ) where Role = 5
